summary: Re-textures dragons to be red, blue, black, and green.
descriptionHtml:
Description
=========================
This is a retexture of the dragons in Skyrim. 
Dragons should now be Red, Blue, Black and Green.
Ohdaviing should now be Red and Parthurnax should now be blue. 

This uses luddemann\'s Colorful Dragons Parthurnax texture as a base because I personally like the color swirl on the dragons wing. Thank you luddemann.

Luddemann also inspired me to do this mod so thank you again luddemann.

DnDish Dragons Files
=========================
To change the dragon\'s colors follow these steps.
1) Download DnDish Dragons Files from the MISC Files Section,
2) Pick the color dragon you want.
3) Rename that file to: 
   dragon for the normal dragons
   dragon_frost for the frost dragons
   dragon_swamp for blood dragons
   dragon_earth for elder dragons
   dragon_boss for ancient dragons
4) Copy and Paste that file to Data/Textures/Actors/Dragon and over wright the file there currently.
5) [Optional] Use these codes to view your dragon in game: 
   Player.placeatme F811D (to spawn Ancient Dragon)
   Player.placeatme F8117 (to spawn Blood Dragon)
   Player.placeatme F8102 (to spawn Elder Dragon)
   Player.placeatme F8119 (to spawn Frost Dragon)
   Player.placeatme EAFB4 (to spawn Regular Dragon)
WARNING using any other color for the swamp dragon other than green will result in the webbing being an ugly black color without a fixed alpha texture. Sorry.

Requirements
=========================
Skyrim

Installation Instructions
=========================
Copy and Paste the files in this mod into your Skyrim\\Data folder.
OR
Download with the Nexus Mod Manager. It is a wonderful tool. Embrace it.

Uninstallation Instructions
=========================
Delete the files associated with this mod.
OR
Unistall with the Nexus Mod Manager.

Incompatability
=========================
Proabably only incompatable with other rextextures of dragons.

Known Issues
=========================
None that I know of...

Change Log
=========================
v2.0 Updated the Green Dragon\'s Alpha texture and webbing.
v1.6 Updated the Black Dragon Texture to look more realistic. Started over and redid everything.
v1.5 Updated the Green Dragon Texture to look more realistic. Redid the eyes, horns, and mouth areas.
v1.4 Updated the Red Dragon Texture again. I missed some spikes in 1.2 and the horns on the top of the Red Dragon\'s head were not to my liking.
v1.3 Updated the Blue Dragon Texture to look more realistic. Redid the eyes, horns, and mouth areas.
v1.2 Updated the Red Dragon Texture to look more realistic. Redid the eyes, horns, and mouth areas.
v1.1 Updated the Green Dragon Texture to be darker.
v1.0 Initial Release

Credits
=========================
luddemann for the Colorful Dragons retexture which can be found here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1346
Bethesda Softworks for Skyrim.

Legal
=========================
You can do whatever you want with this rextexture except for what is listed in the Permissions and Credits. You must however give credit to me(xRevan117x), luddemann, and Bethesda Softworks.
author: xRevan117x

files.name: DnDish Dragons v2_0
files.changelogHtml: Updated the Green Dragon\'s Alpha texture and webbing.
